title: The impacts of patient mistreatment on healthcare workers' role ...
snippet: Background: Fangcang shelter hospitals have played an important role in the battle against the COVID-19 epidemic in China. title: Exploring patient preferences for involvement in medication management ...
snippet: Aim: The aim of this study was to identify patient preferences for involvement in medication management during hospitalization. Design: A qualitative descriptive study.
